headline.main: ALLIES INCH AHEAD; Americans Again Pace General Advance on Tunisian Fronts EIGHTH ARMY GAINS Light British Naval Craft Score Against Foe in Daring Raids Allies Inch A head in Tunisia Battle As Americans Set Pace of Advance

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, May 2 -- American, British and French forces have inched forward along most of the Tunisian front, improving their positions for the next phase of the Allied drive. Although hundreds of sorties were flown by the Allied Air Force, bad weather continued to hamper air support.
abstract: US forces advance in 2-prong Mateur drive
